entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Antigonish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:27 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.2°C

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming south 40 km/h gusting to 70 this morning. High 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or freezing rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to freezing rain after midnight. Rain along parts of the coast. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain in the afternoon. Rain along parts of the coast in the morning and early in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
